cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a string 'invalid_string' instead of an integer will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent PUSCH thread initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to a string 'invalid_string' instead of an integer will cause MIMO configuration failure and disrupt downlink transmission capabilities.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為字串 'invalid_string' 而非整數會導致 MIMO 配置失敗，並干擾下行鏈路傳輸能力。
